remarks: Bound on the distance between two points in Euclidean space given bounds on the distances in each coordinate.  This theorem and ~ rrndstprj1 can be used to show that the supremum norm and Euclidean norm are equivalent.  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Sep-2015.)
